attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The oryx is a beautiful mammal, not indigenous to the UK, but important to global ecology on account of her glorious horns.

The oryx is under threat due to poaching, global warming, overweight veteran actors, etc.

We petition PM Gordon Brown to commit government money to save the oryx, and in doing so, perhaps even save our souls.
